name: 江怡君
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。

scorePolicy:
Average of Weekly Quizzes * 40% (每週小考)
Mid-term Exam * 30% (期中考)
Final Exam * 30% (期末考)


(小考和補考) Students are required to preview assigned reading and do homework. There will be weekly quizzes on homework at the beginning of each class. Late students can ask for a make-up quiz administered by the teaching assistant, but 20 points will be automatically deducted. An absent student cannot ask for a make-up quiz. Yet, for all students, one lowest quiz grade needs not to be factored into the average calculation.

(實際報考) Students who do take BULATS Standard Test within the semester will be awarded extra 10 points to their final grade. 

(小老師) Teaching assistant will be awarded 3 bonus points to his or her final grade. 

(作弊) Any student caught cheating in a quiz or exam will be given a zero for his or her final grade without any room of negotiation.
materials: Success with BULATS (by Nick Brieger & Jeremy Comfort)
